Text: Var documentation Cc PST Heres the link to the VaR documents that Nilay mentioned in last weeks meeting Theyre under Risk SystemsAnalytics enalivelinkexefuncllobjIdobjActionbrowsesortname Nilay please send a copy of the log file to everybody in this email Just a reminder the meeting on Friday will be at EB PM regular weekly schedule PM on Fridays stays the same Thanks Tom
Exec Summary for Project Green Light Cc Good morning Sally Please find attached the executive summary for Project Green Light Please let me know if you have any questionschanges Thanks Tom

MGMT power books Cc Kori Errol After speaking with Enpower IT I was informed there were calcs performed for Lavos power books yesterday PM officialized PM not officialized didnt have the positions therefore nothing is being picked up in RiskTrac had the positions but it was not saved as officialized so RiskTrac is not picking it up as well We need to have saved as official so RiskTrac can pick up the positions Please call me if you have any questions Thanks Tom

RE MGMT power booksthanks Original Message From McLaughlin Jr Errol Sent Tuesday November PM To Victorio Tom Subject RE MGMT power books I have officialized the and unofficialized Thanks Errol Original Message From Victorio Tom Sent Tuesday November PM To Loibl Kori McLaughlin Jr Errol Cc Hernandez Nancy Considine Keith Subject MGMT power books Kori Errol After speaking with Enpower IT I was informed there were calcs performed for Lavos power books yesterday PM officialized PM not officialized didnt have the positions therefore nothing is being picked up in RiskTrac had the positions but it was not saved as officialized so RiskTrac is not picking it up as well We need to have saved as official so RiskTrac can pick up the positions Please call me if you have any questions Thanks Tom

RE Enpower positions Cc Thanks Casey Shouldnt these restrictions apply to all portfolios commodity only and excluding ancillary curves Original Message From Evans Casey Sent Thursday October PM To Victorio Tom Cc Postlethwaite John White Stacey W Subject RE Enpower positions Tom For East Power when you do your extract you should select commodity only as the deal category so you will not pick up any capacity positions as they are included in neither Var nor our position reports Also you should query by delivery point and exclude all of the following delivery points region codes in parentheses as they are ancillary and credit positions and not energy positions per se Min Spinning RJ Min NonSpinning RK Min Op Reserve RL Op Cap RN Renewable Energy Credits RR Regulation Up RW Regulation Down RX Responsive Reserve RY NonSpinning Reserve RZ Let me know if you have any questions Casey Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Thursday October PM To Victorio Tom Cc Evans Casey Postlethwaite John Subject FW Enpower positions RisktRAC Yes except South America is not in EnPower yet The portfolio is set up but no transactions are captured there The West looks close but the East is completely off Also AlbertaENA should not be zero RetailEast RetailWest are test Portfolios and should not be included Stacey Original Message From Victorio Tom Sent Thursday October PM To White Stacey W Subject Enpower positions Hi Stacey Weve generated the numbers below directly from EnPowerAdhoc effective date Just a couple of points I need to confirm before we can try to generate our DPR numbers from this query where can we get the spreadsheet positions from are these all the Enpower portfolios we should be picking up for Power do the numbers for NA look correct I will be sending the numbers daily to the contacts listed any other names I should add Thanks Tom OLE Object Picture Metafile

FW Adhoc queryHi Stacey Norman had a couple of questions regarding extracting position info from Adhoc Can you please provide answers to the first below I wanted to be consistent with how you are reporting your positions in your reports Thanks Tom Original Message From Lee Norman Sent Friday October PM To Victorio Tom Subject RE Adhoc query Dear Tom Are you only interested in the Power positions Do you need the Gas position for a Spread Option deal Do you want only the Post IDs officialized by Power PortCalc so the Exchange deals position calculated in ERMT need not be included Can the results be in vertical format eg East Nov East Dec West Nov West Dec Thanks Norman Original Message From Victorio Tom Sent Friday October AM To Lee Norman Subject Adhoc query Importance High Hi Norman Ive tried running some queries using Adhoc and I always get too detailed information We only need total MONTHLY peak and offpeak positions for a couple of portfolios Ive attached a file to illustrate the information we need Can you please take a quick look and let me know if it would be possible to write a query to generate the info on a daily basis Since the query may take a while to run and we need the info by AM everyday I would prefer to automatically run the query at say AM Let me know your thoughts Thanks Tom File Power positionsxls

Exec Summary for Project Green Light Cc All Please find attached the executive summary for Project Green Light that Sally discussed with Rick Also heres a brief update on some of the ongoing projects ERMSRiskTrac feed Initiated Still estimating completion by RiskTrac Hierarchy restructuring Initiated Testing to begin Position reporting benchmarks Statement of work completed Preventing book duplication Currently in testing Book archiving In phase suspending already archived books Please feel free to callemail for any additional info Tom

RE Enpower positionsStacey ALBERTADIR is in the table Peak Offpeak Per your last email Ill remove RETAILEAST and RETAILWEST For spreadsheets we currently see the following POWERSSRBPRC POWERSSRCPRC POWERSSRBPRC Well take these from RiskTrac For SouthAmerica positions we can also take from RiskTrac The numbers for EAST and WEST are off because I ran the query at around AM I didnt realize that Adhoc only holds the last calculated numbers not as of a certain effective date If we run the query everyday at AM can we be sure were capturing all of previous days trading And none of current days Thanks Tom Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Thursday October PM To Victorio Tom Subject RE Enpower positions I was incorrect about Alberta ENA it should be zero but where is Alberta It should have a big position Stacey Original Message From Victorio Tom Sent Thursday October PM To White Stacey W Subject Enpower positions Hi Stacey Weve generated the numbers below directly from EnPowerAdhoc effective date Just a couple of points I need to confirm before we can try to generate our DPR numbers from this query where can we get the spreadsheet positions from are these all the Enpower portfolios we should be picking up for Power do the numbers for NA look correct I will be sending the numbers daily to the contacts listed any other names I should add Thanks Tom OLE Object Picture Metafile
